request.description:
Get information about a product by passing the product `id` as a path parameter.

### Response

Upon a successful request, the response will contain a `product` object matching the search criteria.

If no product with that ID is found, the request will return a `Not Found` error.

response.name: Succesful Response

request.description:
List all products that exist at the the database.

### Response

Upon a successful request, the response will return an array of nested products.

response.name: Successful Response

request.description:
List all products that exist at the the database. With the difference that with each call the products change order.

Response  
Upon a successful request, the response will return an array of nested products.

response.name: Successful Response
Successful Response different order
